name: Aspect's
description:
UPDATE 1.0.1 LAUNCHED AT 5AM-Minimum Specs                 
  • i5 7600k                
  • GTX 1650                                         
  • 8GB RAM
  • WINDOWS 10/11
-Game Type?
  • Multiplayer
  • First Person Shooter
-Keep In Mind!!!
  • Game is (Still) under developing so you may check for some update!
  • and there's only 2 weapons and one map updates coming soon

-Input 

  • WASD to move
  • Left CTRL to slide
  • Left Shift to run
  • Left Click To Shoot
  • Right Click to Aim
-Assets Used From Unity
  • Dark UI for user interface elements
  • Seed Hunter for graphics and map design
  • AK-74 weapon 1
  • Sci-fi Pistol weapon 2
  • NEONI and burnboy - Champion Song Used In Game
